name: Weekly Receivables Due
query:
SELECT 
    name,
    grand_total,
    outstanding_amount,
    due_date,
    status,
    creation
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice`
WHERE 
    docstatus = 1
    AND status != 'Paid'
    AND due_date BETWEEN 
        DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY)  -- Monday of this week
        AND DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 6 DAY)  -- Sunday of this week
ORDER BY 
    due_date ASC;
